The Challenge | It All Starts At Yes
NCS 2014, the start of something amazing
Since January, we’ve been busy visiting schools all over London to let everyone know about NCS with The Challenge - and the awesome summer you could have after exams.
We’ve already had over 15,000 young people sign up nationwide, so don’t miss out on the summer of a lifetime.
Sign up here between 14 and 21 April and pay only £35. Quote the code NCSAPRIL3 on the website.
Exclusive NCS event in Tower Hamlets!
We would like to invite you, your family and friends to join us at our exclusive Tower Hamlets event on Saturday 26th April at the John Scurr Community Centre, 1A Bekesbourne St, London, E14 7JQ.
The event will run from 2.00pm - 4.00pm and is a great chance for you to find out more information about the programme, including options if you will be observing to Ramadan and all-female programmes. There will also be the opportunity for you to meet other young people who will be going on the programme this summer.
Translators will be available on the day and light refreshments will be provided. Please confirm your attendance by emailing laura.rowland@the-challenge.org or by calling Laura on 07908945109.
Sign up!
We really do only have a few places left, so don’t forget to apply during the Easter break – remember to quote your code!
Financial support is available so get in touch if you need assistance in paying.
Got a question about accommodation? Please visit the questions page on our website to find out more
Visit NCSTheChallenge.org …NOW!
